name: Triple A hole
description: You are a giant corporation ad your goal for this game is to reach 1 hundred thousand dollars. To do this you must select a series of options that will make you money before publishing a game. But watch out for each monetary decision that may increase your hate meter and if your hat meter hits 5000 the fans riot and destroys your empire. In order to stop this from happening you must choose options that cost money but reduce hate. can you juggle a delicate balance between the 2?
